span.strong: Mount Holly Township Schools Closed March 16 - May 15
Remote learning for students begins on 3/17. All COVID-19 related info can be found on the COVID-19 Information Quick Links or Under News Section

strong.br:
Escuelas del municipio de Mount Holly cerradas del 16 de marzo al 15 de mayo
El aprendizaje remoto para estudiantes comienza el 17/3. Toda la información relacionada con COVID-19 se puede encontrar en los enlaces rápidos de información de COVID-19 o en la sección de Noticias

em.span: Every student will have an excellent educational experience.
To cultivate the capacity for lifelong learning, the creativity for innovation, and the curiosity for exploration.

span.em: We pursue excellence through perseverance, integrity, collaboration, and inspiration.

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

p.span:
MOUNT HOLLY TOWNSHIP PUBLIC SCHOOLS
2020 – 2021 FULL DAY FOUR-YEAR OLD PRESCHOOL AND KINDERGARTEN
REGISTRATION INFORMATION
Students must be 4 years of age on or before October 1, 2020 to enter Preschool and 5 years of age on or before October 1, 2020 to enter Kindergarten. You must be a resident of Mount Holly Township to register your child.

span.span: Registration is by appointment only and you must pre-register online prior to an appointment being scheduled. Click HERE to be directed to Mount Holly Township School pre-registration site. Appointments will be scheduled the first week of February. You may also contact Lauren Ptaszenski, in the Central Registration Office at the John Brainerd School at 267-3600 ext. 4113 or email her with any questions at lptaszenski@mtholly.k12.nj.us
